item.title: Are you living paycheck to paycheck? Here’s what I’d do to take control of my money and break the cycle: 1. Track every expense using a budgeting tool or my free budgeting sheet. 2. Level up your savings by setting aside at least 10-20% of your paycheck.
item.description: By @calltoleap: Are you living paycheck to paycheck? Here’s what I’d do to take control of my money and break the cycle: 1. Track every expense using a budgeting tool or my free budgeting sheet. 2. Level up your savings by setting aside at least 10-20% of your paycheck.
